item.title: Christin add a quote by Haven Kimmel
item.description: "Mother always said she was a size 7 woman she kept wrapped in fat to prevent bruising." -- Haven Kimmel

item.title: Christin add a quote by Haven Kimmel
item.description: "On Jesus: "Everyone around me was flat-out in love with him, and who wouldn't be? He was good with animals, he loved his mother, and he wasn't afraid of blind people." -- Haven Kimmel

item.title: Christin add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "when we are weary, we speak lovingly of dreams as if they embodied our true deisres-What we WOULD have when that which we DO have so sorely disappoints us" -- Anne Rice

item.title: Christin add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "There is one purpose to life and one only: to bear witness to and understand as much as possible of the complexity of the world- its beauty, its mysteries, its riddles." -- Anne Rice

item.title: Christin add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "How shameful. How predictable! How insipid. And how sweet." -- Anne Rice

item.title: Christin add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "Heaven would be Hell in no time if every cruel, selfish, vicious soul went to Heaven." -- Anne Rice

item.title: Christin add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "A lady came up to me one day and said 'Sir! You are drunk', to which I replied 'I am drunk today madam, and tomorrow I shall be sober but you will still be ugly." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: Christin add a quote by Sir Winston Churchill
item.description: "To each there comes in their lifetime a special moment when they are figuratively tapped on the shoulder and offered the chance to do a very special thing, unique to them and fitted to their talents. What a tragedy if that moment finds them unprepared or unqualified for that which could have been their finest hour." -- Sir Winston Churchill

item.title: Christin add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Christin add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Christin add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "To weep is to make less the depth of grief." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Christin add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Presume not that I am the thing I was." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Christin add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Why, man, he doth bestride the narrow world Like a Colossus; and we petty men Walk under his huge legs, and peep about To find ourselves dishonourable graves." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Christin add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Our doubts are traitors, and make us lose the good we oft might win, by fearing to attempt." -- William Shakespeare
